div.div: Monmouth College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Lake Forest wins coin toss, defers, and will defend east end zone.
Jon Gurchak kickoff 59 yards to the MC06, C.J. Shields return 5 yards to the MC11 (Corey Lustig; C. Silvestri).
Trey Yocum rush for 2 yards to the MC13 (Jordan Cruz; John Preston).
Brik Wedekind pass complete to Trey Yocum for 4 yards to the MC17 (Ed Dobernig).
Brik Wedekind pass incomplete to Austin Peterson.
